Ease your mind and save time with the Live Password Generator, your go-to tool for safe, random password generation, now with an improved search experience.

In search of a reliable, free password generator? You've landed in the right place!

Live Password Generator allows you to customize your password to your preferred complexity: choose the character types, set the length, and hit Generate. Our tool will swiftly craft a secure password, which will be safely stored under History. You can clear this history with a single click.

Given the plethora of online platforms requiring passwords that meet various criteria, such as a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, a specific length, etc., the Live Password Generator has been designed specifically to streamline this process.

Our password generator is simple and user-friendly. It operates seamlessly in both online and offline modes, featuring only two tabs: History and Generate.

Additionally, upon installation, the extension sets your new tab's search provider to https://livepassword.com. This feature grants you immediate access to our password generator each time you open a new tab, thus making your experience even more convenient.

To start benefiting from our tool, click the blue 'Add to Chrome' button and integrate a powerful password generator directly into your browser! Live Password Generator is your gateway to creating strong, intricate, and secure passwords. Just remember - from now on, it's all about robust passwords!
